## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                               | Type               | Default   |
| ----------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ | --------- |
| `align`     | `align`     | Sets the buttons alignment                                | `"end" \| "start"` | `'start'` |
| `dangerous` | `dangerous` | Defines if the primary button should have a danger accent | `boolean`          | `false`   |
